questions.question: Like thinking from first principles, what are all the bottleneck problems that are still stopping fusion working today?
Can you explain this work and can AI model and simulate arbitrary quantum mechanical systems in the future?
First of all, yourself, what do you think, how the heck did life originate on Earth?
So out there looking for friends, do you think there's a lot of alien civilizations out there?
If we destroy ourselves, how will we do it and how easy is it to do?
Well, I think all of those things you suggested are good candidates, fire and cooking, right?
Do you think in order to solve intelligence, we also need to solve consciousness along the way?
Do you think AGI systems need to have consciousness in order to be truly intelligent?
